title: The Physicists: playing dice with the universe
creator_credit: Roger Hogen, D Leiterman, Philip S. Hobel and Document Associates
brief_description: Describes the work of physicists as they experiment with ideas which few can comprehend. Tells how some are mapping the tiniest structures of matter, others are listening to the universe, hoping to discover intelligent life, and others are looking for black holes.
